context.description: CWPADL79A1 Explanation: The adapter name has been changed; therefore, the adapter name in the artifacts must be altered to be compatible with earlier versions. User Action: Rename the adapter name in the service descriptors.

CWPADL79A2 Explanation: The function selector has been changed; therefore, the function selector in the artifacts must be altered to maintain backward compatibility. User Action: Rename the function selector in the service descriptors.
